problems.title: Longest Substring With At Most Two Distinct Characters (Sliding Window)
problems.description:
Given a string s, return the length of the longest substring that contains at most two distinct characters.

Input Format:
First line: string s.

Output Format:
Print a single integer: the length of the longest valid substring.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
eceba

Sample Output
3

Explanation: The substring is "ece" which its length is 3.
problems.constraints:
1 <= s.length <= 10^5
s consists of English letters.
hintsList: Think about how to use a sliding window to optimize the solution.
Consider using a frequency map or two pointers to track the window state.
